Class EmailTLS

  • java.lang.Object
    • assets.EmailTLS

  • public class EmailTLS
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Raviv Komem This class is used to send emails using pre-existing system gmail address

      boolean sendMessage(java.lang.String toRecipient, java.lang.String bccRecipient, java.lang.String subject, java.lang.String message)
      This method will send a mail to the recipient and the bcc recipients The email will consists of the subject and body will be the message

    • Method Detail

      • sendMessage

        public boolean sendMessage(java.lang.String toRecipient,
                           java.lang.String bccRecipient,
                           java.lang.String subject,
                           java.lang.String message)
        This method will send a mail to the recipient and the bcc recipients The email will consists of the subject and body will be the message
        Parameters:
        toRecipient - - the email address to be located in the: To segment
        bccRecipient - - the email address to be located in the: BCC segment
        subject - - the email subject
        message - - the email message
        Returns:
        boolean of the message status, true if it was sent properly and false otherwise

      • sendMessage

        public boolean sendMessage(java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> toRecipients,
                           java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> bccRecipients,
                           java.lang.String subject,
                           java.lang.String message)
        Parameters:
        toRecipients - - Collection of all the "TO" email addresses
        bccRecipients - - Collection of all the "BCC" email addresses
        subject - - the email subject
        message - - the email message
        Returns:
        boolean of the message status, true if it was sent properly and false otherwise
